entry.title: Look at me, Look at me, I Exist, I Exist
entry.summary:
Author: ciarabuckleydiaz

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 159,376Chapters: 30/43Kudos: 200

Summary: Evan knew he'd be in a group home forever. I mean, who wants a 15 year old boy who's got autism and ADHD? Nobody. That's the truth. Everyone wants a pretty, shiny baby, perhaps a young, cute toddler. Not a traumatised, desperate of love teenager. So why was he chosen? That's the question he wants to know. Maybe it was pity.   OR bobby and athena foster/ adopt teenage evan buckley!

entry.title: Death called to the wolf
entry.summary:
Author: shadowkatninjawarrior

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 189,688Chapters: 82/?Kudos: 1,603

Summary: Evan Buckley was intimately familiar with death. It hung in the air around him, lived under his skin.It was the reason he'd been born in the first place.Maybe it had seemed like some awful cosmic joke to his parents when they'd found out the source of his magic. It could have been anything.It just had to be death.Eddie Diaz doesn't know how to be a werewolf.Which is unfortunate, given he's been one all his life. He brought his son to LA to get away from it all, but he couldn't run from what he was.Or:Death Mage Buck and Werewolf Eddie find one another at the 118.

entry.title: The Shape of Things Falling Apart
entry.summary:
Author: 79_50

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,461Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 5

Summary: After Chris moves in with Buck, Eddie Diaz does what he’s always done best: he takes control. He plans. He prepares. He makes sure there are no loose ends. Buck watches the man he loves grow quieter, calmer, and terrifyingly resolved, and realises too late that Eddie isn’t coping. He’s preparing. This is a story about love, guilt, and what happens when someone decides the best way to protect the people they love is to disappear.

entry.title: baby, where the hell is my husband (what is taking him so long?)
entry.summary:
Author: queerbaited_by_ABC

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,309Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 25

Summary: Eddie visibly lights up. “Oh no.” Buck says, shaking his head and pointing at him from across the counter. “No, no no, absolutely not, whatever you’re about to say—“ “You don’t even know what I was gonna say!” Eddie protests. Buck scoffs, crossing his arms. Eddies eyes track the movement, watching semi-entranced as his biceps stretch the fabric of his t-shirt. “Knowing how petty you are? You were probably about to propose we tell them we’re married or something!” Eddie innocently looks to the kitchen ceiling and not at Bucks face, which he’s sure has flushed that pretty pink that compliments his blue eyes so well. Jesus, has he always been this sappy? “Eddie.” Buck says. “Eddie.” He stresses again.

entry.title: Underneath (the weight of the world)
entry.summary:
Author: Lothely

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 150,408Chapters: 14/14Kudos: 960

Summary: When he finally came back almost eight months after the ladder truck bombing, Buck hadn't expected a warm welcome from his teammates. But as their resentment towards his choice of suing the LAFD never wavers, he finds himself falling into a spiral of depression that could lead to severe consequences. The Earth never stops spinning on its axis, and just as the sun rises and sets every day and the moon reflects its light, the universe never stops forcing Buck to deal with new and old traumas. A visit from someone from Buck's past fundamentally changes the 118's views about their teammate, as old wounds are poked and left exposed, and everyone is forced to learn how to navigate their resentments and guilt.

entry.title: How it Really Happened
entry.summary:
Author: naenae1985

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,531Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 31

Summary: “Please…”, he hears himself whine in a tone that he’s never heard before. What is wrong with him? “Please, what, baby? Tell me what you want.” Evan says, almost mockingly as continues to slowly stroke, squeezing every few strokes to do nothing more than make Tommy lose his mind. “Please…more. I, fuck, Evan, need more”, he says breathily, barely able to get out the words. Evan’s light touches drive him more and more out of his mind with arousal. Or Buck has always had complicated relationships. He knows this one will be just as complicated, if not more than others, but he also knows it will be worth every bit. Thinking about the past leads into the future and he realizes he's excited about what has yet to come.

entry.title: would you hold it down and take it if i gave you a chance?
entry.summary:
Author: retrorecord

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,483Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: EDDIE doesn’t know why the program is getting more meat to chew up and spit out by the newest Jaeger Mark; the rookies are showing more promise and far less stubbornness. Eddie’s going to prove his own point, though, even if that means having to be nice to Jaeger pilots, and maybe opening a bit more about himself and how he ended up in the Hong Kong Shatterdome. TOMMY understands Evan’s paranoia about their compatibility, and the invitation from Hong Kong to show their stuff to be pilots for a new Mark of Jaeger seemed like a perfect opportunity for them. Tommy knew they were going to be tested, pushed, and pulled, especially with a category of Kajiu looming. Tommy just didn’t know his test would be called Eddie. BUCK had paced the floors of the Los Angeles Shatterdome to polish by the time he, Tommy, and Maddie moved to the Hong Kong Shatterdome. Buck was ready for new dynamics, but the rift between pilots and staff was a shock. Buck himself tastes the brunt of it, and after some pretty bad footing, Buck finds the steadiness with some help and a petty charge nurse.

entry.title: for shade or whatever may come
entry.summary:
Author: SymphonySoldier97

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,925Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 60

Summary: Besides, Eddie needed Buck. It wasn't healthy for him to keep trudging through his dry spell, uninterested in strangers in person or on a screen, avoiding a new relationship after being recently shown just how spectacularly unprepared for that he is. He shouldn't have to go on without a release, not when he has Buck, who's perfectly suited to give Eddie familiarity and something good to watch at the same time.Eddie's been out in the elements for a long time. Buck wants nothing more than for Eddie to use him for shade. Or whatever else he might need.After all, he's done far worse for far less.ORBuck and Eddie aren't talking about it. But they aren't necessarily ignoring it, either.

entry.title: cleared for climax
entry.summary:
Author: rhodeys

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,313Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 199

Summary: “This your first commercial flight or something?” “With you, yeah.” Buck’s grin widens, playful now, the earlier panic tucked safely away. “What, no commemorative gift?” Eddie glances down at their joined hands—Buck’s fingers still loosely tangled with his, thumb still stroking the skin there. “Permanent custody of my hand ain’t cutting it for you?” Or, Buck gets over his fear of flying, and joins the Mile High Club. Exactly in that order.
